data.eml:eml: A new species of the Rhinella margaritifera group (Anura: Bufonidae) from Brazilian Pantanal

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ávila, Robson W., Pansonato, André, Strüssmann, Christine (2010): A new species of the Rhinella margaritifera group (Anura: Bufonidae) from Brazilian Pantanal. Zootaxa 2339: 57-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.193265
